title: MechWarrior 2: 31st Century Combat

description: Microsoft Golf's designers focused on the elements of a great golf game without going overboard on the bells and whistles.

title: Roberta Williams' Phantasmagoria
description: Phantasmagoria is Sierra's first attempt at a full-blown, live-action, interactive video adventure, and their ambition far outweighs the results.

title: Police Quest: SWAT
description: SWAT begins with an interesting premise, but the designers seem to have paid too much attention to detail in the wrong areas.

title: Resurrection: Rise 2
description: If you're looking for an expensive screensaver, this is the title for you.

title: Steel Panthers
description: Steel Panthers is your chance to recreate some of World War II's classic armor battles from the comfort of your own home.

title: The Dark Eye
description: The Dark Eye is without a doubt one of the most original computer games ever created.

title: Trophy Bass
description: If you're at all interested in the concept, you'll find Trophy Bass well-made and fun to play. If not, cast your line elsewhere.

title: Warhammer: Shadow of the Horned Rat
description: In short, the fighting is uninvolving and the story uninteresting.

title: Whiplash (1996)
description: This new racing sim from Interplay sets itself apart from the pack with tracks that hearken back to slot-car racing, featuring highly adept opponents, and competitive multi-player action.
